tool_description: Easily verify, check or lookup address. The Global Address JSON API takes in any global address in one line or multiple lines, and matches it against the best postal reference sources (246 countries and territories) to correct, verify and standardize U.S., Canadian and international addresses.
name: Global Address
title: Global Address

api_list.name: Global Address
api_list.description: Validate, Standardize and Cleanse Addresses across the globe

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the Response (XML or JSON)

optional_parameters.name: DeliveryLines
optional_parameters.description: Specify if the Address Lines 1-8 should contain just the delivery address or entire address.
